attributes.action: completely overhaul the current welfare system so that the right people receive benefits and people fit for work, work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Benefits should be time limited for those who are able to work but have not found a job within a resonable amount of time. Compulsory Jobs should be provided by the government or provided in partnership so these people go to work. It should be made easier for people who are entitled to benefits to make a claim.Welfare should be given to uk residents who have lived and worked in this country for a period of time e.g 3 years.
